Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Toy \Toy\, v. i. [imp. & p. p. {toyed}; p. pr. & vb. n. {toying}.] To dally amorously; to trifle; to play. [1913 Webster]
To toy, to wanton, dally, smile and jest. --Shak. [1913 Webster]
toying n : playful behavior intended to arouse sexual interest [syn: {flirt}, {flirting}, {flirtation}, {coquetry}, {dalliance}]
